room_title: Escape room "Edison vs. Tesla" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: I’ve been here twice and we have had an amazing time. Great rooms. Really builds communion. We even came in second place on the Edison be Tesla room. Let’s go “The 13%ers”!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Edison vs. Tesla" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: This was a fun way to spend an hour trying to escape from themed rooms. They have 5 different themes. We had to escape by finding Thomas Edison's patent which involved puzzles, locks, clues, hidden objects and movement between 2 rooms. 6 people per theme, so not crowded. Some clues are difficult - we were fortunate to escape right before time expired. Great fun, good for party or team building event.

room_title: Escape room "Edison vs. Tesla" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
review: The owners were SO great and we had a blast! The rooms are incredibly well decorated and so well thought out. After coming from only 1 experience at a different escape room I was blown away by the intensity and fun this was. The Edison Room is a MUST! Thank you for such a great time, we will most definitely be back!
